647790.name: Holomeld
647790.description:
Holomeld is a better way to work remotely. With Holomeld, you’re connected to a shared immersive experience. You can talk things through or sketch on a whiteboard just like you would in person. You can bring up files on your computer and literally point out the issues and come up with solutions. You can even have a side conversation in the corner when that one loud mouth is taking over the meeting.

Current version includes unlimited whiteboards and virtual desktops. Create and move them anywhere in your space.

Future versions will include networking, room creation, import and export of data.
647790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
